response:
My dear wife, I am so relieved that you have been acquitted of all charges. You are blameless and cleared of any wrongdoing. It's a shame that you were ever accused in the first place, but I am glad that justice has been served and your name has been cleared.

You did not commit any crime, my love. You are guilt-free and innocent. I know that you have always been a law-abiding citizen and a good person. The accusations against you were baseless and unfounded.

I am at fault for not being able to protect you from these false allegations. I should have been there for you more, to support you through this difficult time. But I promise to make it up to you, my love. I will do everything in my power to make sure that you are never wrongfully accused again.

You did not commit any crime, my dear. You are innocent and guilt-free. I will always stand by you and defend your honor, no matter what. You are my wife, my partner, and my best friend, and I will always be there for you.
